Text: Coordination with EWS Cc Hodge will be out of the office beginning at noon tomorrow through next week If you have any issues that need to be discussed with him this week please let me know and I will coordinate an EESEWS meeting with Jeff tomorrow morning While Jeff is out of town he asks that we continue to copy him but all questionissues should be directed to Carol St Clair Jim Keller will be back next week and will be setting up meeting times with Carol as we have with Jeff

Bill ManagementWere you working on a Bill Management Agreement form that was final or near final

RE Bill ManagementThanks From Bill nronxgate on AM To Deborah ES cc Subject RE Bill Management At one point we considered using a bill management agreement for Consolidated Container I worked on this with Erin Stus We came up with a draft that I was fairly happy with and it should be the latest draft under my Consolidated Container file on the j drive If you cant find it there give Erin a call She should still have a copy Original Message From Culver Deborah Sent Monday November AM To Rapp Bill Subject Bill Management Were you working on a Bill Management Agreement form that was final or near final

PSA and Confirm FormFor those of you beginning to work with our PSA and Confirm form the provision guaranteeing lease payments in the event savings are insufficient is in the Additional Provisions document in FormsBank styled Project Savings Deficit Payments This provisions may be added to Section of the Confirm if it is part of your deal You will need to convert the language to plain English I am recommending to the Product team that this be added back into the form itself since all of the marketing materialIve seen references a savings guarantee I attach a copy of these Additional Provisions below
